synopsis.text: Before ascending to the rank of an invincible hero, Saitama embarked on a journey filled with rigorous training and relentless battles. As his clothing bore the brunt of his fierce combat, a compassionate tailor from a nearby shop mended his garments free of charge. When the tailor's shop is threatened by a local gang, Saitama resolves to intervene, ultimately earning something invaluable. This original story, penned by the One Punch Man manga creator ONE, unveils the untold beginnings of Saitama's iconic hero suit. As the tale unfolds, Saitama discovers that the very neighbors who reside in his modest apartment complex are the ones responsible for the chaos gripping the town. Will Saitama be able to restore peace, or will the situation spiral into an all-out war among neighbors? Join Saitama in this thrilling adventure that precedes his legendary one-punch victories.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
